attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This is the worst app i have ever downloaded. athe second i downloaded it my phone caught on fire 🤬 I am typing this of the trap phone as we speak. Donald J Trump put a voodoo curse on this app to steal our information. DO NOT VOTE FOR HIM

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: This app is horrible!!! It turned my whole screen orange for 6 days and kept yelling racist and sexist slurs out of my speaker. Couldn’t leave the house for days. 0/10

attributes.title: Use to Support Trump
attributes.review: I can’t believe I have to make this review. Trump really is the epitome of an evil human-being. I have been a Republican for years and now this year... I can’t bring myself to vote for him.
